props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: align
props.description: Placement of the viewport for css variables `(--akar-navigation-menu-viewport-left, --akar-navigation-menu-viewport-top)`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: forceMount
props.description:
Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when
controlling animation with Vue animation libraries.
